title: Working from home
brief_description: Outlines the practical steps involved in launching and running your own home business. You will receive vital tips on how to avoid common pitfalls, and how to reach your potential faster. Topics covered include: why home business is booming, the benefits and disadvantages, what type of business can be run from home, launching your home business, managing your business - and yourself, what happens if you are sick, and much more. Presented by Charles Weyman.
